articles.title: Watch: Dravid consoles teary-eyed Rohit in heartbreaking scenes after India loss - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rohit Sharma, who was made the captain of the Indian team with the eye on the T20 World Cup, was left teary-eyed after the team crashed out, before he was consoled by head coach Rahul Dravid. | Cricket
articles.content: England openers Jos Buttler and Alex Hales put on an authoritative show at the Adelaide Oval on Thursday as they crushed India by 10 wickets to book their seats in the final of the T20 World Cup. Ind… [+1554 chars]

articles.title: Ravindra Jadeja Thanks PM After Wife Picked As Gujarat BJP Candidate - NDTV
articles.description: Indian cricket star Ravindra Jadeja today congratulated wife Rivaba on being picked as a BJP candidate for the upcoming Gujarat elections and thanked Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Home Minister Amit Shah for giving her the opportunity.
articles.content:
Ravindra Jadeja congratulated wife Rivaba and wished her the best for the poll contest

articles.title: Wasim Jaffer Trolls Ex Pakistan Star Over Dig After Babar Azam-led Side's T20 World Cup Final Entry - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Former Pakistan cricketer Imran Nazir took the opportunity to troll former India batter Wasim Jaffer. He tagged Jaffer in a tweet with a photo of Amitabh Bachchan after Pakistan's entry into the final.

articles.title: Ramiz Raja aims cheeky dig at WC teams after Pakistan thrash NZ to enter final - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) president Ramiz Raja has come up with a noteworthy statement after Babar Azam-led Pakistan outclassed New Zealand to enter the T20 World Cup final on Wednesday. | Cricket
